sn44.4:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye …pe…
sn44.4:1.3: “Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu, ko paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.4:1.4: “Rūpaṃ kho, āvuso, ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpasamudayaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:1.6: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:1.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
sn44.4:1.11: viññāṇaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇasamudayaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:1.13: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:1.14: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”tipissa hoti.
sn44.4:2.1: Rūpañca kho, āvuso, jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpasamudayaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.4:2.2: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.4:2.6: viññāṇaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇasamudayaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
sn44.4:2.7: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
sn44.4:2.8: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
sn44.4:2.9: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.4:2.10: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
